mapper.insert: insert into qna_reply (rno, bno, reply, replyer) values (seq_qna_reply.nextval, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
mapper.update: update qna_reply set reply = #{reply}, updateDate = sysdate where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select rno, bno, reply, replyer, replyDate, updateDate from qna_reply where bno = #{bno} order by rno asc
